# Google Button Component

This is a standalone google button component to login user and get their data. To get the user emitted from the successful login, it triggers an event `userEmitted` and it returns the user data.

## Getting Started

To start using this component:

```bash
npm install google-login-button
```

To use on an Vanilla JS application, add this to your html file:

```bash
  <google-login-button></google-login-button>
```

and also import the script file:

```bash
  <script type="module"
    src="./node_modules/google-login-button/dist/google-login-button/google-login-button.esm.js"></script>
```

To use on an Angular application:

Update the module you want to use the component:

```bash
  schemas: [CUSTOM_ELEMENTS_SCHEMA],
```

update the main.ts file:

```bash
import { defineCustomElements } from 'google-login-button/loader';

defineCustomElements(window);
```

then you can add this to the template of the compoent:

```bash
  <google-login-button></google-login-button>
```
